programme.title: Jane Byrne voted Chicago mayor
programme.short_synopsis: Surprise win for Jane Byrne in Chicago mayoral vote.
programme.medium_synopsis: Surprise win for Democrat outsider Jane Byrne in Chicago mayoral vote.
programme.long_synopsis:
Surprise win for Democrat outsider Jane Byrne in Chicago mayoral vote.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
